A window with vertical bars is positioned in the foreground on the left, while the hallway itself extends into the background, creating a sense of depth. At the end of the hall, a closed door is centered in the frame, located in the background. The camera then moves steadily forward down the corridor, causing the door to grow larger in the frame. As the camera gets closer, the door, still centered, opens outward and to the right. The shot concludes as a wide view of the room seen through the open doorway. In the final framing, the open door occupies the middle ground on the right. Within the room in the background, a chair is positioned in the center, a medical cart is to its left, and a small table is to its right.
